name: Alan M. Frieze
content: Alan Frieze's Home Page Alan Frieze Department of Mathematical Sciences Carnegie Mellon University Office: Wean Hall 6204 Phone: 412-268-8476 Fax: 412-268-6380 Mailing Address: Department of Mathematical Sciences Carnegie Mellon University Pittsburgh PA15213 USA email:friezeATcmuDOTedu My main research interest is Probabilistic Combinatorics and its applications in Theoretical Computer Science and Operations Research. Publications ICM2014 Talks Teaching Introduction to Random Graphs: Book Old notes on counting and rapidly mixing Markov chains ACO Homepage Aladdin Project Homepage Carol Frieze Puzzle Page Awards and Honors Graduate Students Editorial Responsibilities WaterMellon 2005 Notes on random graphs Eight Lectures on Random Graphs: MAA-AMS Meeting, Atlanta, 2005.
